remarks: The ` X ` determining functional ` G ` belongs to the atom formed by the orthocomplement of the kernel.  (Contributed by NM, 4-Jan-2015.)
statement:
dochsnkr2.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dochsnkr2.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochsnkr2.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochsnkr2.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
dochsnkr2.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` U ) $.
dochsnkr2.a $e |- .+ = ( +g ` U ) $.
dochsnkr2.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` U ) $.
dochsnkr2.l $e |- L = ( LKer ` U ) $.
dochsnkr2.d $e |- D = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
dochsnkr2.r $e |- R = ( Base ` D ) $.
dochsnkr2.g $e |- G = ( v e. V |-> ( iota_ k e. R E. w e. ( ._|_ ` { X } ) v = ( w .+ ( k .x. X ) ) ) ) $.
dochsnkr2.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dochsnkr2.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( V \ { .0. } ) ) $.
dochsnkr2cl $p |- ( ph -> X e. ( ( ._|_ ` ( L ` G ) ) \ { .0. } ) ) $.
$d .+ k v w $.
$d ._|_ k v w $.
$d .x. k v w $.
$d D k $.
$d R k v $.
$d V v $.
$d X k v w $.
